attributes.action: Call on Boris Johnson to resign as PM for his handling of the COVID 19 crisis.
attributes.additional_details: The level of competency demonstrated by this Govement lead by Boris Johnson is evidently lacking. This has resulted in the collapse of the credibility of this Government and therefore its ability to manage this crisis affectively.
attributes.background: Remove Boris Johnson from his position as PM for failure to handle the Covid 19 crisis and losing the trust of the British people in the Goverment.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.
